availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edmund W. Hawkins (Newport, Campbell Co atty)

body.p: Newport, Campbell County attorney and judge. Virginia native. Married Mary A. Munday Hawkins in 1855. Father of Richard Hawkins, Elva Hawkins, and Edward Hawkins. Held ten slaves in 1860.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-029-0592. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 154. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 240. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Campbell County, Newport, p. 346. Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 462. Kentucky Marriage Records, 1852-1914, Ancestry, Marriages, Owen County, 1855. “Edmund W. Hawkins,” Find A Grave, March 3, 2013, memorial no. 106123793 (accessed April 17, 2017).
